content: this is my first foray into pattern writing so please be gentle with me i would love to hear any feedback and constructive criticism but mostly i would love to see what you create feel free to tag @snakewoodandgrace on insta or #audreydress the dress can be made to fit any size using a slightly larger hook ie a 4 5mm will allow more stretch you can also add a couple of increases around the hips if needed for a two coloured midi dress in size 8-10 you will need approx 1 200g ball of each colour more will be required if you choose to make a maxi i strongly recommend trying it on for sizing once you have sewn up the bodice it s much easier to unpick a few slip stitches and add another round or two than discover it doesn t fit at the end
